tag_list: video, communication, training, learning, silverlight, azure, lecture-capture, classroom, continued-education
overview:
Nadeem Khan is an entrepreneur, he has founded several companies, including Vidizmo LLC, and Softech Worldwide LLC.

Under his leadership, Softech Worldwide developed and delivered world’s largest enterprise video platform serving 300k employees of Veterans Affairs.

His latest innovation is VIDIZMO, an online video platform for Corporate Communication, Organizational Development, Training & Learning. VIDIZMO makes live or on-demand video presentations searchable & engaging; VIDIZMO is available can be used indepdently or with othe appications such as a LMS, SharePoint or CRM.
